bugphyzz

Source: vignettes/bugphyzz.Rmd
bugphyzz.Rmd

Introduction

The bugphyzz package provides access to an electronic resource of harmonized microbial annotations from different sources. The resource can also be accessed by direct download at >>> insert Zenodo link here <<<.

Import bugphyzz 

if (!require("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

## Devel version
BiocManager::install("waldronlab/bugphyzz")
library(bugphyzz)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
bp <- importBugphyzz(version = 'devel', force_download = TRUE)
#> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'httr':
#>   method           from  
#>   print.cache_info hoardr
#> Replacing previous version downloaded on 2023-09-03 20:38:27.
#> Using data downloaded on 2023-09-03 20:41:37.
head(bp)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 16
#>   NCBI_ID Taxon_name   Rank  Attribute Attribute_group Attribute_source Evidence
#>   <chr>   <chr>        <chr> <chr>     <chr>           <chr>            <chr>   
#> 1 207244  Anaerostipes genus acetate … acetate produc… NA               asr     
#> 2 105841  Anaerostipe… spec… acetate … acetate produc… NA               asr     
#> 3 1229621 Anaerostipe… spec… acetate … acetate produc… NA               inh     
#> 4 2025494 Anaerostipe… spec… acetate … acetate produc… NA               inh     
#> 5 2738446 Anaerostipe… spec… acetate … acetate produc… NA               inh     
#> 6 2838461 Candidatus … spec… acetate … acetate produc… NA               inh     
#> # ℹ 9 more variables: Frequency <chr>, Score <dbl>, Unit <chr>,
#> #   Attribute_range <chr>, Note <chr>, Confidence_in_curation <chr>,
#> #   Attribute_type <chr>, BacDive_ID <chr>, Type_strain <chr>

Explore wich attribute groups are available 

unique(bp$Attribute_group)
#>  [1] "acetate producing"                    
#>  [2] "aerophilicity"

Explore which attribute signatures are available 

head(unique(bp$Attribute))
#> [1] "acetate producing--TRUE" "aerobic"                
#> [3] "aerotolerant"            "anaerobic"              
#> [5] "facultatively anaerobic" "animal pathogen--FALSE"

Creating signatures

Create signatures of taxids at the genus level for aerophilicity 

aer <- bp[which(bp$Attribute_group == 'aerophilicity'),]
sigs1 <- getBugphyzzSignatures(
  df = aer, tax.id.type = 'NCBI_ID', tax.level = 'genus', min.size = 10
)
map(sigs1, head)
#> $`bp:aerophilicity|aerobic|g`
#> [1] "204476"  "45402"   "556257"  "773"     "186650"  "1649484"
#> 
#> $`bp:aerophilicity|aerotolerant|g`
#> [1] "1494427" "2834353" "2683678" "1930791" "1924101" "1935206"
#> 
#> $`bp:aerophilicity|anaerobic|g`
#> [1] "1123951" "1594166" "274591"  "1759400" "1931196" "2911176"
#> 
#> $`bp:aerophilicity|facultatively anaerobic|g`
#> [1] "204476"  "1123951" "1594166" "1759400" "1931196" "2911176"

Create signatures of taxa names at the species level for optimal ph 

op <- bp[bp$Attribute_group == 'optimal ph', ]
sigs2 <- getBugphyzzSignatures(
  df = op, tax.id.type = 'Taxon_name', tax.level = 'species', min.size = 10
)
map(sigs2, head)
#> $`bp:optimal ph|acidic (<6)|s`
#> [1] "Rhizobium nepotum"     "Rhizobium laguerreae"  "Rhizobium alvei"      
#> [4] "Rhizobium helianthi"   "Rhizobium azibense"    "Rhizobium aethiopicum"
#> 
#> $`bp:optimal ph|alkaline (>=8, <9.76)|s`
#> [1] "Hyphomicrobium sulfonivorans"    "Hyphomicrobium album"           
#> [3] "Hyphomicrobium zavarzinii"       "Hyphomicrobium facile"          
#> [5] "Hyphomicrobium chloromethanicum" "Hyphomicrobium aestuarii"       
#> 
#> $`bp:optimal ph|neutral (>=6, <8)|s`
#> [1] "Candidatus Bartonella antechini" "Bartonella birtlesii"           
#> [3] "Bartonella ancashensis"          "Bartonella naantaliensis"       
#> [5] "Bartonella saheliensis"          "Candidatus Bartonella raoultii" 
#> 
#> $`bp:optimal ph|very alkaline (>9.76)|s`
#> [1] "Maritimibacter alexandrii"     "Maritimibacter harenae"       
#> [3] "Maritimibacter sp. DP4N28-5"   "Thiomicrospira microaerophila"
#> [5] "Thiomicrospira sibirica"       "Thiomicrospira thyasirae"

Other examples 

mot <- bp[bp$Attribute_group == 'motility',]
sigs3 <- getBugphyzzSignatures(
  df = mot, tax.id.type = 'Taxon_name', tax.level = 'mixed'
)
lapply(sigs3, head)
#> $`bp:motility|motility--FALSE|pcofgst`
#> [1] "Proteobacteria"         "Alphaproteobacteria"    "Hyphomicrobiales"      
#> [4] "Xanthobacteraceae"      "Ancylobacter"           "Ancylobacter aquaticus"
#> 
#> $`bp:motility|motility--TRUE|pcofgst`
#> [1] "Proteobacteria"         "Alphaproteobacteria"    "Hyphomicrobiales"      
#> [4] "Xanthobacteraceae"      "Ancylobacter"           "Ancylobacter aquaticus"

Merge examples above 

sigs <- c(sigs1, sigs2, sigs3)
lapply(sigs, head)
#> $`bp:aerophilicity|aerobic|g`
#> [1] "204476"  "45402"   "556257"  "773"     "186650"  "1649484"
#> 
#> $`bp:aerophilicity|aerotolerant|g`
#> [1] "1494427" "2834353" "2683678" "1930791" "1924101" "1935206"
#>
